item.description:
Join us as we kick off as we crawl down Lansdowne St celebrating the warm weather and the beginning of the Red Sox season, Cinco de Mayo, the Kentucky Derby, and the Boston Bruins playoff Game 2.

Here is the schedule:

2:00 p.m. - Yardhouse
3:30 p.m. - Boston Beer Works
5:00 p.m. - Game On
6:30 p.m. - Bleacher Bar
8:00 p.m. - Lansdowne Pub

For those of you who are attending for the first time - Welcome!  Can't wait to meet you!  I will be at each of the bars listed above at the times shown above.  You are more than welcome to arrive whenever you are able.

For those of you who have already attended one of our pub crawls before - Welcome back!  Can't wait to see you again.

Be sure to be responsible and remember to tip your bartenders, they will be working hard for us.
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my picture and so should you... just look for me at the bar.
item.name: Lansdowne Street Pub Crawl
